content.rendered:
Divine journeys ahead

Discover divine destinations by road

To promote religious destinations to tourists, the Karnataka State Tourism Department launched Puneeta Yatra. Since most of these destinations were accessible by road, idols that are commonly seen on four-wheeler dashboards were used to drive home the message.
